text: Casanova's Big Night is a 1954 American comedy movie directed by Norman Z. McLeod and starring Bob Hope, Joan Fontaine, Audrey Dalton, Basil Rathborne, Hugh Marlowe, Arnold Moss, John Carradine, John Hoyt, Hope Emerson, Lon Chaney Jr., Raymond Burr, Vincent Price. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1954 comedy movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Z. McLeod Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Casanova's Big Night
